pages.text: $(li)Foxhounds are a variant of the $(l:patchouli:pets/revamped_wolf/wolf)Wolves$(/l) that can be found over the Nether.$(br)$(li)They will attack you and set you on fire.$(br)$(li)You can tame these creatures drinking a $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/fire_resistance)Fire Resistance Potion$(/l), and then, feed them with $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/coal)Coal$(/l).
$(li)If a Foxhound is situated on the top of a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l), it will accelerate the smeltery process.
